title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 240-2.3 - List transmittals
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 240-2.3 - List transmittals

State Regulations

The department shall annually provide to NYSDOT and the
other involved agencies a list of all applicable SIP revisions expected to be
submitted to EPA that calendar year. NYSDOT shall annually provide to the
department and the other involved agencies a list of all actions requiring a
conformity determination that calendar year. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
240-2.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
